comparison.description: The condition to apply to a string value when querying for findings. Valid values include: `EQUALS` and `NOT_EQUALS`.

key.description: The key of the map filter. For example, for `ResourceTags`, `Key` identifies the name of the tag. For `UserDefinedFields`, `Key` is the name of the field.

value.description: A date range value for the date filter, provided as an Integer.
